mapper.select: SELECT * FROM js_sys_user WHERE BINARY login_code=#{loginCode} AND status !='1'

SELECT c.pic_url as picUrl, c.num_iid as numId, a.goods_name as goodsName, a.quantity as quantity, a.price as price, a.spec as spec, a.sku_id skuId FROM js_am_order_detail a LEFT JOIN tb_sku b ON a.sku_id = b.sku_id LEFT JOIN tb_product c ON c.num_iid = b.num_iid WHERE a.document_code = #{documentCode}

SELECT a.document_code AS documentCode, a.document_type AS documentType, a.customer_name AS customerName, a.mobile_phone AS mobilePhone, a.create_time AS createTime, a.total_fee AS totalFee, a.document_status AS documentStatus FROM js_am_order a
(a.customer_name LIKE '%${nameOrPhone}%' OR a.mobile_phone LIKE '%${nameOrPhone}%')
AND (a.office_code = #{officeCode} OR a.office_code IN (SELECT b.office_code FROM js_sys_office b WHERE b.parent_codes LIKE '%${officeCode},%') OR a.create_by in (SELECT c.user_name FROM js_sys_user c LEFT JOIN js_sys_employee d ON c.user_code = d.emp_code WHERE d.office_code IN ( SELECT e.office_code FROM js_sys_office e WHERE e.parent_codes LIKE '%${officeCode},%')) OR (a.create_by = #{userName}))
ORDER BY str_to_date( a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) DESC
SELECT a.tree_names FROM js_sys_office a LEFT JOIN js_sys_employee b ON a.office_code = b.office_code WHERE b.emp_code = #{userCode}
